pageProduct.name: Palmers Coconut Oil Formula Lip Balm 4g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Coconut Oil Formula Lip Balm is a decadently creamy lip balm, which keeps lips hydrated all day long, and prevents against chapping, cracking and environmental damage from the sun or wind.

Warnings

Contains Benzophenone-3. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Ethically and sustainably sourced Coconut Oil and Tahitian Monoi Oil, infused with Tiaré flower petals, deliver rich moisturisation for soft, pampered lips. 24 hour moisture. With SPF 15. No Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oil, Gluten, or Dyes.

Ingredients

Ozokerite, Glycine Soja Oil, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Octyldodecanol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Benzophenone-3, Cetyl Alcohol, Aroma, Myristyl Myristate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Theobroma Cacao Butter, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Gardenia Tahitensis Flower Extract, Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Myristyl Laurate, Stearyl Alcohol, Myristyl Alcohol, Stevioside, Rebaudioside A, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene.

Directions

(Adults and children 3 years of age and over). Apply liberally whenever your lips need a boost of hydration.
